questions.title: The baby smiles at you. What do you do?

answers.answer: Smile back
Stare at the baby, look for further cues
Smile, then pick her up, then throw her into the air screaming “fly to the moon little birdy!”

questions.title: Now the baby makes high pitched sounds, looking in different directions, waving her small hands. What do you do?

answers.answer: Start talking back in a high pitched voice, then take some pics and send them to your father
Pick her up, rub her back, let her suck on your left nipple
Let her alone for some minutes

questions.title: The baby is actually sleeping, and has been for some hours. What do you do?

answers.answer: Take a nap yourself
Play with yourself, then take a nap, then hold her hand and whisper that she will always be alright
Edit some photos of her, then drink some coke, then go for a walk, then call a friend that works with autistic children

questions.title: You are tired, the baby is playing with a blanket. What do you do?

answers.answer: Call for a nanny
Stare at the wall, think about engines and stuff
Lay down next to her, say some mumbo jumbo, listen to her response, laugh whenever appropriate

questions.title: The baby’s diaper stinks, she has slept for approx. ten minutes. What do you do?

answers.answer: Let her sleep, watch some Desperate Housewives
Bring her to your chest, walk to your tiny bathroom, get her a new diaper, be at peace with yourself
Call your love interest, sit on their face, make sure you know how the baby is doing, wake her up after 50 minutes and ask her how she feels, smile if necessary

questions.title: The baby is screaming, and you are making a new video game about killing people. What do you do?

answers.answer: Finish the game, then go look after the baby (it should only take 15 minutes)
Finish the game, then go look for your integrity, then look for the baby, give her an ice cream
Pick her up and talk to her, sing Bohemian Rapsody or Rude Boy if needed

questions.title: You hit your head while holding the baby. What do you do?

answers.answer: Suck it up
Scream, then explain to the baby that you are alright and that emotions are cool stuff
Dance the pain away, make sure you hold eye contact with the baby

questions.title: The baby starts talking to you, but you do not understand a word of what she is saying. What do you do?

answers.answer: Walk backwards until you reach the door, then think faster than you normally do
Talk back with phrases and intonation that sounds similar to those she is using. Look at her now and then
Stare at her, smile, say a few sentences, ask her if she knows where mommy is

questions.title: A five-year-old is playing with a basketball next to your kid. What do you do?

answers.answer: Ask the five-year-old to go and brush her teeth
Wait and see
Smile and start playing with the five year old, make sure she calms down somewhat

questions.title: You are at the local cafe and your baby is starting to cry. What do you do?

answers.answer: Start breastfeeding the kid, while finishing your coffee
Pour the rest of the coffee into your mouth, take the kid to a nearby park, breast feed her there
Go to the toilet and talk to the baby about crying at public places

questions.title: The baby’s face is turning blue. What do you do?

answers.answer: Do basic CPR, call the medical hotline
Inspect the baby, smile at her, shake her a bit
Google the symptoms, wait and observe

questions.title: The baby is unhappy. You are unhappy. What do you do?

answers.answer: Google depression
Play some soft Santana, sing a lullaby, try to feed the baby some yoghurt
Sing a soothing lullaby, cry at the beautiful scene you have created

questions.title: The baby looks at you with a joyous face. What do you do?

answers.answer: Ask if the plastic toys were fun to play with
Smile back, give her a tight hug, laugh
Smile enthusiastically at her, comment on how happy she seems

questions.title: Your nephew wants to hold your baby, he is a very active and distractible kid. What do you do?

answers.answer: Explain how to hold your baby safely, watch him holding her
Refuse to let him hold her
Ask him to come by later, when he has less sugar in his blood system

questions.title: Your nephew wants to hold your baby, he is a very active and distractible kid. What do you do?

answers.answer: Explain how to hold your baby safely, watch him holding her
Refuse to let him hold her
Ask him to come by later, when he has less sugar in his blood system

questions.title: Someone is calling you. What do you do?

answers.answer: Answer then and there
Play with your baby until she falls asleep
Turn off the phone and lay down and see what happens

questions.title: Your baby has a doctor’s appointment. What do you do?

answers.answer: Go and let her have the vaccine
Refuse to answer the doctor’s office, let the baby eat healthy grey food
Ask about the vaccine

questions.title: The baby fell off the chair and hit her shoulder. What do you do?

answers.answer: Wait and see if she shakes it off
Help her up, soothe her, look at her shoulder
Say that you are sorry for her, then act as if you yourself are falling off the chair

questions.title: A child psychologist comes to your house to ask about how you feel. What do you do?

answers.answer: Talk about emotions and children in general terms
Say the truth
Show the psychologist how you interact with your child
